rules.description: Check account is created fromCvent Lead Conversion
This rule checks the Agreement__c field when Physicians_Locator_Contact__c is checked.

rules.description: Contact Us leads outside of the United State

rules.fullName: FIND A DOC lead email notification

rules.description: to map Lead record type hidden to account record type hidden

rules.fullName: Map Lead Record Type Person Account
rules.description: to map Lead record type hidden to account record type hidden

rules.formula: OR ( ISBLANK (Email), NOT(CONTAINS(Email,'@')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Primary_Country__c,'US')), (OR(Country <> "US",Country <> "USA", Country <> "United States")), ISBLANK(Country), RecordTypeId <> "012C0000000Qcym", RecordTypeId <> "012C0000000Q3ot" )

AND( NOT (ISBLANK (Email)), CONTAINS(Email,'@'), (OR ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Primary_Country__c,'')), ISPICKVAL(Primary_Country__c,'US'), NOT(ISBLANK (Country)), (OR(Country = "US",Country = "USA", Country = "United States" )))), OR( RecordTypeId = "012C0000000Qcym",RecordTypeId = "012C0000000Q3ot") )
